description: artist: Jorge Rivera-Herrans, Luke Holt, Cast of EPIC: The Musical

lyrics.english: Alright, my brothers, listen closely
Tonight we make the Trojans pay
lyrics.korean: 오늘 밤 우리는 트로이인들이 대가를 치르게 할 것이다

lyrics.english: Ten years of war, they killed us slowly
lyrics.korean: 10년 간의 전쟁 동안 저들은 우리를 천천히 죽여 왔지

lyrics.english: But now we'll be the one's who slay
lyrics.korean: 하지만 오늘은 우리가 그들을 사냥하는 쪽이다

lyrics.english: Think of your wives and your children
Your families wonder where you've been
lyrics.korean: 너희의 가족들은 너희가 어디에 가 있었는지 궁금해한다

lyrics.english: They're growing old and yet you're still here
lyrics.korean: 그들은 나이를 먹어 가는데 너희는 아직도 여기에 있지

lyrics.english: Do what I say and you'll see them again
lyrics.korean: 내 명령을 따르면 그들을 다시 보게 될 것이다

lyrics.english: SOLDIERS
Diomedes will lead the charge
Agamemnon will flank the guards
Menelaus will let our mates through the gates
lyrics.korean: 메넬라오스는 우리의 동료들을 성문을 통해 들여보내

lyrics.english: to take the whole city at large
lyrics.korean: 도시 내에서 활개칠 수 있게 하시오

lyrics.english: Teucer will shoot any ambush attack
lyrics.korean: 테우크로스는 매복을 있는 대로 제거할 것

lyrics.english: And Little Ajax will stay back
lyrics.korean: 그리고 소 아이아스는 물러나 있을 것

lyrics.english: Nestor, secure Helen and protect her
Neo, avenge your father, kill the brothers of Hector!
lyrics.korean: 네오, 네 부친의 복수를 해라, 헥토르의 형제들을 죽여라!

lyrics.english: Yes sir!
Find that inner strength now
Use that well of pride
Fight through every pain now
Ask yourself inside
What do you live for?
What do you try for?
What do you wish for?
What do you fight for?
What do you live for?
What do you try for?
What do you wish for?
What do you fight for?
Penelope...
Penelope...
And Telemachus
I fight for us, I fight for us
lyrics.korean: 나는 우리를 위해 싸우고 있어, 우리를 위해

lyrics.english: (What do you live for?) Penelope
(What do you try for?) Telemachus
(What do you wish for?) I'm on my way
(What do you fight for?) Attack!
Aaaagh!
...Who was that?
A vision
Of what is to come, can not be outrun
Can only be dealt with right here and now
lyrics.korean: 오직 바로 여기에서만 처리할 수 있는 일이지

lyrics.english: Tell me how
I don't think you're ready
A mission
To kill someone's son, a foe who won't run
lyrics.korean: 누군가의 아들을 죽이는 일이지, 달아나지 않을 적이로다

lyrics.english: Unlike anyone you have faced before
lyrics.korean: 이전에 네가 마주하였던 어느 누구와도 다를 것이다

lyrics.english: Say no more, I know that I'm ready
lyrics.korean: 더 말씀 마소서, 제가 준비되었음을 압니다

lyrics.english: I don't think you're ready
It's just an infant, it's just a boy
What sort of imminent threat does he pose that I can not avoid?
lyrics.korean: 도대체 이 아이가 제게 가할 임박한 위협이란 무엇입니까?

lyrics.english: This is the son of none other than Troy's very own prince Hector
lyrics.korean: 이 아이는 다름아닌 바로 트로이의 왕자 헥토르의 아들이니라

lyrics.english: know that he will grow from a boy to an avenger
lyrics.korean: 이 아이가 소년에서 복수귀로 자랄 터이니

lyrics.english: One fuelled with rage as you're consumed by age
lyrics.korean: 네가 세월에 삼켜지는 동안 그는 분노로 차오를 것이니라

lyrics.english: If you don't end him now you'll have no one left to save
lyrics.korean: 여기서 이 아이를 끝장내지 않으면 네게는 지킬 이가 누구도 남지 않으리라

lyrics.english: You can say goodbye to (Penelope)
You can say goodbye to (Penelope)
I could raise him as my own
(He will burn your house and throne)
Or send him far away from home
(He'll find you wherever you go)
Make sure his past is never known
lyrics.korean: 그의 과거가 결코 알려지지 않게 할 수 있습니다

lyrics.english: (The gods will make him know)
I'd rather bleed for ya, I'm on my knees for ya
lyrics.korean: 차라리 제가 대신 피를 흘리겠습니다, 무릎이라도 꿇겠습니다

lyrics.english: (He's bringing you down on your knees for ya)
I'm begging, please!
(Oh, this is the will of the gods)
Please don't make me do this, don't make me do this
lyrics.korean: 제발 제게 이 일을 시키지 마십시오, 제게 이 일을 시키지 마세요

lyrics.english: The blood on your hands is something you won't lose
lyrics.korean: 네 손의 피는 네가 결코 면치 못할 것이니

lyrics.english: All you can choose is whose
lyrics.korean: 네가 택할 수 있는 바는 누구의 피일지이다

title: The Horse and the Infant
